DataElement.preferredName: Operating Room Collected Specimen Gross Pathologic Examination Room Receive Date/Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date and time the specimen arrived in the pathology gross room from the OR specified in military time format.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Operating Room Collected Specimen Gross Pathologic Examination Room Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A room in a health care facility equipped for the performance of surgical operations and procedures._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings that are caused by disease._An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling._To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: A room in a health care facility equipped for the performance of surgical operations and procedures.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings that are caused by disease.:An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings that are caused by disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Display format: MM/DD/YYYY HR:MN; Use NCIt based Rep Class
